alert.note: Alert for Apple and Lucerne Valleys; Coachella Valley; San Diego County Deserts; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 27 at 7:39PM PST until December 28 at 3:00AM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM PST TUESDAY... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...West winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts to 45 mph. Locally 30 to 45 mph with gusts to 60 mph near the San Gorgonio Pass * WHERE...Apple and Lucerne Valleys, Coachella Valley, San Diego County Deserts and San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning. * WHEN...Until 3 AM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds will be gusty through Tuesday morning, but High Winds are no longer expected.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Apple and Lucerne Valleys; Coachella Valley; San Diego County Deserts; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning
